/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/base.dir/base.cpp.o CMakeFiles/base.dir/common/clutils.cpp.o  -o base   -L/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/parallel-scan/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc  -L/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/parallel-scan/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL  -Wl,-rpath,/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/parallel-scan/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc:/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/parallel-scan/OpenCL-ICD-Loader/inc/CL:/home/walid/OpenCL-parallel-programming/parallel-scan/build/OpenCL-ICD-Loader OpenCL-ICD-Loader/libOpenCL.so.1.2 -lpthread -ldl
